resources.string: FingerprintBlocker
May everyone be treated gently by the world
1. Activate \"Device Admin\"
We needs this permission to disable fingerprint unlock
2. Setup timer
Disable fingerprint unlocking at specified time
Remove timer (Disable)
Unregister timed task and stop working
Disable fingerprint unlock every night 3:30am. It prevents others from unlocking your phone without your knowledge while you are sleeping.
Disable is temporary, fingerprint unlock will continue to work after unlock once with a password or pattern
Disable \"Device Admin\"
In some manufacturers\' firmware, you need to disable the device administrator before you can uninstall this application
Lock screen and test is it works
Device admin enabled :)
Device admin disabled
Best wishes :)
Disable fingerprint unlock at a specified time every day. It prevents others from unlocking your phone without your knowledge while you are sleeping.
Successfully registered the timer
Successfully unregistered the timer
Okay, Please lock screen and try unlock after 5 minutes
